comments.author: Michael Lydeamore
comments.text: I've read this 5 or 6 times and I still don't understand what it means. Break it down way more slowly, and you may need a diagram to help.

comments.author: Michael Lydeamore
comments.text: This is a bit too high level - tell me how to access these. You can include code and it's output (and you should!) that highlight this.
